entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: SSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
